.. pkginfopage:

========
PKG Info
========

Structure of the package
========================

.. code-block:: bash

    eNMRpy/
    |
    |-- Measurement/
    |   |-- __init__.py
    |   |-- base.py
    |   |-- eNMR_Methods.py
    |   |-- Pavel.py
    |   |-- Emma.py
    |   |-- Juergen1.py
    |   |-- Simulated.py
    |
    |-- __init__.py
    |-- Phasefitting.py
    |-- MOSY.py
    |-- tools.py
